ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Right on Polanya.  Been in many Sebilis groups with a shaman or druid as primary healer.  In those groups I always go for healing and haste (used to be
ygData.messageBody:
Right on Polanya. Been in many Sebilis groups with a shaman or druid as
primary healer. In those groups I always go for healing and haste (used to
be nivs+hymn+haste, now Catana+nivs+haste). The only thing that annoys me
more then the 'we have to have a healer' types is the 'have to have a
chanter' types. Was in Sebilis the other night and we had blast in the
bar/armorer rooms. I was primary CC and we were doing great. Group broke up
and the next group I was in spent the next two hours whining about how we
had to have and enchanter. We could have easily gone down and rebroken the
bar/armorer area, but instead did Gangrenous *yawn*.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Polanya Bladedancer [mailto:polanya@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 8:38 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
>
>
> Just gotta throw in my opinion here. If I had waited to find
> balanced
> groups, I would
> never have gotten to 53. I have made a considerable portion of my 53
> levels with just a
> warrior at my side. We welcome others to group with us
> without regard for
> class because
> for the most part we don't need any specific class. I really
> get annoyed
> at the "we have
> to have a healer" types. I am the first to admit that I am a
> cleric junkie
> but with careful
> planning, (and more careful pulling), our healing songs, and
> a stack of
> band aids we are usually fine.
>
> While I am posting, I might as well get screamed at for this
> observation. With any healer
> type other than a cleric, I can heal the party up faster than
> they can heal
> us and then med
> up enough mana to be ready to go again. At first I marked
> it up to a bad
> player but as I have
> partied with more folks, this observation still holds true.
> Scream away at
> me, tell me that
> I am crazy. No worries from me.
>
> Pol
>
>
> >i find it too hard to wait around for a balanced group, so i
> grab whoever
> >happens to
> >be around and drag em off to sebilis. well actually most of
> the time i
> >just live in
> >sebilis and pick up whoever happens to be hanging around the
> zonein. so
> >we usually
> >have at least on hole in the group, sometimes more, heh.
>
>
